subject: ROME
name: Beginning Italian I
info: Basic listening, speaking, reading, writing, and communication skills. Cultural readings.

subject: ROME
name: Beginning Italian II
info: Basic listening, speaking, reading, writing, and communication skills. Cultural readings.

subject: ROME
name: Intermediate Italian I
info: Conversation/comprehension proficiency. Reading/writing skills. Grammar review.

subject: ROME
name: Intermediate Italian II
info: Conversation/comprehension proficiency. Reading/writing skills. Grammar review.

subject: ROME
name: Survival Italian
info: This course is designed as a survival language course with emphasis on developing the necessary language skills to handle the most frequent situations encountered while staying in Rome. It focuses on communication in everyday practical situations and aims at getting students started in learning Italian.

subject: ROME
name: Society, Citizenship & Ethics
fullname: Society, Citizenship, and Ethics in Post-Unification Italy
info: Culture/identity from Italian historical perspective. Students visit Orvieto, a medieval hilltop town famous for its paintings, frescos, and 'underground city' of tunnels/passageways.

subject: ROME
name: Roman Art
info: Uses Rome as a campus to address role of patrons, nationality of artists, and actual technical production of works of art. Students visit Pompeii, a city frozen in time that reveals the historical heritage of ancient Rome.

subject: ROME
name: Made in Italy
info: "Made in Italy" as brand and lifestyle. Lectures, site visits, development of a student group marketing plan. Students visit Castello Banfi Winery in Tuscany.

subject: ROME
name: Italian Communications
fullname: Italian Communications: Popes, Politicians, and Popular Culture

subject: ROME
name: Hist. of Art & Design in Italy
fullname: The History of Art and Design in Italy: From Pompeii to Present

subject: ROME
name: Design Theory, Technol & Envt
fullname: Design Theory, Technology, and the Environment

subject: ROME
name: Internships in Rome
fullname: Internships in Rome: A Comparative Approach to the Italian Workforce

subject: ROME
name: Sport & Society in Italy
fullname: Sport and Society in Modern Italy

subject: ROME
name: Materials and Design
fullname: Materials and Design: Integrity and Innovation

subject: ROME
name: Remapping of a Neighborhood
fullname: Remapping of a Neighborhood for Students of Architecture

subject: ROME
name: Community Design
fullname: Exploring Identity: Community Design for Marginalized Groups

subject: ROME
name: Architectural & Urban Lessons
